ygData.subject: LET ME OFF UNSUBSCRIBE ME
ygData.msgSnippet: ... === Kyle Alexander Oliver _____________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Free instant messaging and more at
ygData.messageBody:
--- Valacian <abryson@...> wrote:
> I'm going to assume this is just a rumor. I
> wouldn't see the point of building another mage type
> except Wizard if this were true. That would kind of
> throw the balance of character classes off a bit.
> Wizard's would be everywhere! I could be wrong.....
>
> Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: VorteksJRC@... [SMTP:VorteksJRC@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 6:25 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Cross-class
> research?
>
> From: VorteksJRC@...
>
> That would be very cool. As a magician I am very
> envious over the wizzards
> location-specific gate spells. Let me know what you
> find out.
>
>
>
> In a message dated 5/11/99 2:46:06 PM Eastern
> Daylight Time,
> ecoyle@... writes:
>
> << 've heard rumors that it's possible for a wizard,
> through research, to
> learn spells that would otherwise be available only
> to other classes. For
> example, I am hoping this is the case with my
> Wizard, I want to learn SoW
> desperately (don't we all?).
>
> SOE needs to do a better job of explaining
> research. ;)
> >>
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists
> reside?

> on the Internet.
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell
> components for spell research. Please keep the
> emails on topic.

> ATTACHMENT part 2 application/ms-tnef

Kyle
